attributes.action: make 'pub pool' an Olympic Sport by 2012
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are dedicated to making the sport of pub pool a professional event. All matchs will take place on dodgy tables in dodgy pubs, usually too close to the wall so you cant get a full pull back, with bent cues and no chalk. We believe that all snooker and pool 'professionals' wouldnt stand a chance at this, especially if some girls just put westlfe on the jukebox

reasons: Commercial endorsement, promotion of any product, service or publication, or statements that amount to adverts
